metadata.title: Air/Ocean Data from NOAA Moored Buoys Processed by PFEL

creators.name: Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), Southwest Fisheries Science Center (SFSC), Pacific Fisheries Environmental Laboratory (PFEL)

metadata.description: Processed moored buoy data. These data contain hourly and daily mean values of air temperature, sea temperature, surface atmospheric pressure, wind speed, and wind direction. Sources of the data are 22 different NOAA NDBC moored buoys along the North American west coast. The data have been processed from the raw hourly data files which makes the data much more user friendly. The processed buoy data is updated semi-annually by PFEL.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To provide model derived data products which will assist in describing the variability in the ocean environment.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Semi-Annually

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: Check with Contributor.
